articles.content: Chandigarh reported 711 new Covid-19 cases detected through RT-PCR and Rapid Antigen tests on Saturday, increasing the tally of cases to 37,943 cases. There are 4,902 active cases here. The city also… [+2463 chars]

articles.title: Zydus Cadila's Virafin gets nod as treatment drug - The Shillong Times
articles.description: NEW DELHI, April 24: Drug Controller General of India (DCGI) has granted restricted emergency use approval to Zydus Cadila's Virafin for treating patients showing moderate COVID-19 symptoms, the Department of Biotechnology said on Saturday.Virafin is
